participant_1.background:
I am not honest about my relationship with my girlfriend.
i want to be a movie director when i grow up.
I like to use my creativity to make unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds.
My family is supportive of my endeavors to work puzzles and change the world.
I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.

participant_2.background:
My first purchase was a Game of Thrones book, which I hid in my room so my parents wouldn't find it.
I'm taking advantage of my newfound freedom to travel and see the world.
My appreciation of nature is a key part of my personality.
I live a very active life, but I always make time for my family.
My black lab is my best friend.

content.text: Good! My day is going great! I'm taking advantage of my newfound freedom to travel and see the world. I just got back from a trip to Paris and I'm already planning my next one!
That sounds awesome! I love traveling. I'm not much of a traveler myself, but I would love to go to Paris one day.
You should! It's a beautiful city. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to read, write, and play video games. I also love watching movies and TV shows.
I like to read too! My first purchase was a Game of Thrones book, which I hid in my room so my parents wouldn't find it. I'm a huge fan of the series!
Me too! I'm obsessed with Game of Thrones. I've read all of the books and watched all of the seasons of the show. I'm so excited for the new season to start!
Me too! I'm not sure how I'm going to wait until it comes out!
Maybe we could watch it together when it comes out?
That would be fun! I'd love to watch it with you.
Great! We can exchange contact information and figure out a time to watch it.
